name: 4 of Winter
description:
Controls:
A/D — Walk
E — Use object
Space — Use inventory item
W — Enter building
Q/I — Inventory
1-2-3 — Choose quick item / assign item to quick items from inventory screen

FAQ:
The game isnt done at all. Made about ~20% of all of planned things. Lazy fag.
Yes, the 1-2-3 system is actually stupid and need to be redone somehow. 
10 fuel units required to use helicopter; but actually it'll just show you the game end screen.
Anyway going to redo all this on Unity as GameMaker's gml is ultimate diseaster when game requires something more than just few sprites colliding each other.
